business_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’¼ Business News - 2025-11-12

### Top Stories

1. [LARRY KUDLOW: Are booming stocks signaling a Trump boom?](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/larry-kudlow-booming-stocks-signaling-trump-boom)

2. [Warren Buffett's final letter to shareholders: Read in full here](https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/warren-buffets-final-letter-shareholders-read-full-here)

3. [The top 3 reasons housing has become so unaffordable in the US market â€“ and it's not what you think](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/top-3-reasons-housing-has-become-so-unaffordable-us-market-experts)

4. [Wendy's to close hundreds of US stores next year](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/wendys-close-hundreds-us-stores-next-year)

5. [Activist investors push Cracker Barrel shareholders to oust DEI specialist](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/activist-investors-push-cracker-barrel-shareholders-oust-dei-specialist)

6. [Baby formula recalled as infant botulism outbreak grows](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/baby-formula-recalled-infant-botulism-outbreak-grows)

7. [Trump floats $10K bonus plan for air traffic controllers who've remained on duty during government shutdown](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/trump-floats-10k-bonus-plan-air-traffic-controllers-whove-remained-duty-during-government-shutdown)

8. [Bank of America CEO seeks 'important' meeting with Mamdani, says NYC's success vital to company](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/bank-america-ceo-seeks-important-meeting-mamdani-says-nycs-success-vital-company)

9. [How one company is transforming rural communities with tech careers](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/how-one-company-transforming-rural-communities-tech-careers)

10. [Trump's 50-year mortgage may burden Americans with more debt, experts say](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/trumps-50-year-mortgage-may-burden-americans-more-debt-experts-say)

### Summary

1. Larry Kudlow discusses the possibility that the rising stock market could indicate an economic boom under Trump's presidency, suggesting investor confidence in the administration's policies.
2. Warren Buffett's final letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders provides a comprehensive overview of his investment philosophy, company performance, and reflections on his career.
3. The article identifies three unexpected factors contributing to the U.S. housing market's lack of affordability, challenging common perceptions about the root causes of the issue.
4. Wendy's plans to shutter hundreds of its locations across the United States next year, a significant move for the fast-food industry signaling potential shifts in business strategies or market dynamics.
5. Activist investors are campaigning for Cracker Barrel shareholders to remove a Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) specialist from their board, highlighting tensions over corporate governance and social policies.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-12

### Top Stories

1. [New laser treatment could stop blindness before it starts](https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2025/11/251108083906.htm)

2. [Chinese bridge collapses in landslide months after opening](https://www.upi.com/Top_News/World-News/2025/11/11/bridge-collapse-landslide/4811762893664/)

3. [Microsoft adds native support for 1Password and Bitwarden passkeys to Windows 11](https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-adds-native-support-for-1password-and-bitwarden-passkeys-in-windows-11/)

4. [Is information a fundamental force of the universe?](https://youtu.be/WqYRMmlZmhM)

5. [Building a Hypercube Interpolator (in Rust)](https://jlogan.dev/blog/2025/11/10/2025-11-10-interpn-fast-interpolation/)

6. [How to stop having FOMO as a curious engineer: hold a thread](https://www.yacinemahdid.com/p/how-to-stop-having-fomo-as-a-curious)

7. [China's internet firms revive lending as Beijing pushes consumer loans](https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/chinas-internet-firms-cautiously-revive-lending-beijing-pushes-consumer-loans-2025-11-10/)

8. [Why Screaming Is All the Rage](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/11/11/magazine/collective-screaming-therapy-anxiety-stress.html)

9. [The Bay Area is cursed](https://sashachapin.substack.com/p/the-bay-area-is-cursed)

10. [Docker Compose Continuous Deployment](https://github.com/kimdre/doco-cd)

### Summary

1. A groundbreaking laser treatment has been developed with the potential to prevent blindness by addressing eye conditions before they lead to vision loss, marking a significant advancement in ophthalmology.

2. A recently opened bridge in China succumbed to a landslide, raising concerns about infrastructure resilience and the need for rigorous engineering assessments, especially in landslide-prone areas.

3. Microsoft has enhanced Windows 11 security by integrating native support for the passkeys of popular password managers 1Password and Bitwarden, signifying a move towards stronger, passwordless authentication methods.

4. There's an emerging discussion in the scientific community about whether information should be considered a fundamental force in the universe, alongside gravity and electromagnetism, challenging traditional physics paradigms.

5. The development of a Hypercube Interpolator using the Rust programming language represents a significant step forward in computational geometry, providing more efficient and accurate methods for multidimensional data analysis.
